symptomAnalyzerDescription: Describe your symptoms, and our AI will suggest potential over-the-counter medicines and a relevant medical specialty for informational purposes. This is not medical advice.
symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., I have a runny nose, a slight cough, and a mild headache for the past two days.
suggestedMedicinesInfo: Based on your symptoms, here are some informational suggestions. Always read labels and consult a healthcare professional before taking any medication.
analysisResultsDescription: Please review the AI-generated suggestions below. This information is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
footerDisclaimer: This tool provides informational suggestions and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
noMedicineSuggestionsInfo: The AI could not provide specific over-the-counter medicine suggestions based on the symptoms provided. This could be due to the nature of the symptoms or the AI's limitations. Please consult a healthcare professional for advice.
validationMaxChars: Please enter no more than {count} characters.
validationFailedMessage: Validation failed. Please check the errors below.
errorDuringAnalysisMessage: An error occurred during the AI analysis.
validationLocationMinChars: Location must be at least {count} characters.
validationLocationMaxChars: Location must be no more than {count} characters.
validationSpecialtyMaxChars: Specialty must be no more than {count} characters.
errorDuringSearchMessage: An error occurred while searching for {entity_plural}.
aiGeneratedDataDisclaimer: The following information for '{location}'{specialtyString} is AI-generated and for illustrative purposes only. It may not be real, accurate, or current. Always verify details with official sources. Original AI disclaimer: "{disclaimer}"
noDataGenerated: The AI could not generate illustrative {entity} data for the specified location{specialtyString}.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyInfo: Based on your symptoms, you might consider consulting a specialist in: {specialty}.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyDisclaimer: This is an AI-generated suggestion and not medical advice. A primary care physician can provide a referral if needed.
createPostDescription: Fill in the details below to publish a new article.
postTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of your blog post
postContentPlaceholder: Write your blog post content here...
postExcerptPlaceholder: A short summary of the post...
welcomeAdminDescription: Here's an overview of your MediSeek application.
dashboardOverviewContent: You can manage blog posts and view site statistics from this panel. Use the sidebar to navigate.
deleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the post "{postTitle}"? This action cannot be undone.
blogPostErrorIdMissing: Post ID is missing. Deletion failed.
blogPostDeletionErrorNotFound: Post not found or already deleted.
noBlogPostsFoundAdminDescription: It looks like there are no blog posts. Why not create the first one?
manageBlogsErrorLoading: An unexpected error occurred while loading blog posts. Please try again later.
